title: 'Industry's Ken Leung on Eric's episode 6 sacrifice: 'It's his ultimate show of love'
desc: Season 4, episode 6 of "Industry" sees Eric Tao step away from SternTao. Ken Leung breaks down what's on Eric's mind when he does.

title: Kit Harington and Max Minghella break down 'Industry's NSFW glory hole scene
desc: "Industry" stars Kit Harington and Max Minghella dissect Henry and Whitney's glory hole experience in Season 4, episode 6.

title: xAI Rolls Out Dictation for Grok on Android
desc: xAI has rolled out its new dictation experience for Grok on Android. This update features a dedicated microphone icon inside the chat input field for quick speech-to-text prompts. The feature allows users to tap the mic, speak their prompt, and have it transcribed into text before Grok generates a written reply. However, it is not…

title: China embassy in Singapore reminds citizens to avoid gambling after MBS casino visitor falls to death
desc: The Chinese embassy in Singapore has issued a "solemn" reminder telling its citizens abroad to avoid gambling, which is banned in mainland China.In a statement on Saturday (Feb 14), the embassy reported that a Chinese national who gambled at the Marina Bay Sands casino recently jumped from height and fell to their death."The embassy is currently assisting the family with...

title: 13-year-old Ottawa girl injured in chairlift incident has died
desc: The 13-year-old Ottawa girl who was injured in a chairlift incident at Centre Vorlage in western Quebec last week has died, according to her family.

title: After a shaky start, TikTok's U.S. joint venture lands on its feet
desc: TikTok's U.S. joint venture seems to have survived a turbulent rollout relatively unscathed, as concerns of a mass user exodus now appear overstated.

title: Election Commission suspends 7 West Bengal officials over ‘serious misconduct’ linked to SIR
desc: India News: NEW DELHI: The Election Commission has ordered the immediate suspension of seven West Bengal govt officials at the level of assistant electoral regis.

title: Redeem SG Culture Pass for 3 Chinese New Year movies at Golden Village
desc: SG Culture Pass credits can now be used to watch any of three local titles at Golden Village – 3 Good Guys, Liang Po Po Vs Ah Beng and Luck My Life.

title: India's first ‘cow culture’ museum to open in U.P.'s Mathura
desc: India's first 'cow culture' museum in Mathura will highlight the spiritual and scientific significance of cows and their products.

title: Yaytseslav: Boss of Real Estate Lady Linked to Viral Russian Man Speaks
desc: Yaytseslav Truhov went viral after meeting women in malls and taking them to his home. Serina defended her reputation amid claims of inappropriate advances.
